input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rhone Men's Slim Stretch Performance Commuter Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Tapered Leg Commuter Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Slim Fit Commuter Pant'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Five Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Club Monaco Connor Heathered Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Slim Fit Pants'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Velocity Dress Pant'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Apollo Short Sleeve Sport Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Uniform Performance Chino'
  - Name='Men Corduroy Chino by Bonobos'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Straight-Fit Trutemp365 Chino Pant'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Straight Fit Washed Chinos'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Five-Pocket Pant'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Chino Pants Casual Dress Chinos Pant In Blue Or'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Athletic Slim Performance Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Tech Chino Pant'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Everyday 5 Pocket Stretch Chino Active Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Slim Straight Leg Chino Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Pants Men 33x30 Tan Mason Chino Stretch Performance'
  - Name='Banana Republic Non-iron Tailored Slim Fit Chino Pants Men's Sz 35x32'
  - Name='Men Club Monaco Connor Chinos'
  - Name='Banana Republic Chino Pants Men Size 31Ã—25 Brown ($50 Tags)'
  - Name='Banana Republic Pants | Banana Republic Fulton Skinny Chino Men's Pants Waist 35 Length 32 | Color: Tan | Size: 35 | Mycrew2u's Closet'
  - Name='Banana Republic Traveler Chino Slim Fit Tan Beige Pants Men's 30 X30'
  - Name='Men's Slim Lived-In Chino Acorn Regular Size 29W'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Slim Stretch Performance Commuter Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are slim fit commuter pants with stretch and performance features, similar in purpose as versatile pants though focused on performance fabrics rather than traditional chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Tapered Leg Commuter Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tapered commuter pants are close in style and function to the reference chino, intended for versatile daily wear, though may have more technical fabric emphasis.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Slim Fit Commuter Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit commuter pant aligns well with chinos in fit and usage, though emphasis on commuter and performance materials differs from organic cotton chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Five Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar slim fit, five-pocket styling akin to chinos, mainly used for daily versatile wear but likely performance material rather than organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Connor Heathered Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dressier style pants possibly linen or heathered fabric, less rugged or chino-specific material, but similar straight/tailored fit and usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Commuter Slim Fit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another slim-fit commuter pant from Rhone, similar silhouette and use case as the reference chinos but with a technical fabric focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry of Supply Men's Velocity Dress Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress pant with performance aspects; different in material and more formal style compared to casual chinos, less rugged and less traditional chino construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry of Supply Men's Apollo Short Sleeve Sport Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A shirt product, unrelated category, no relevancy to chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Uniform Performance Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A performance chino very close in category and style to the reference; fabric and features suggest a modern chino with responsible materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men Corduroy Chino by Bonobos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Corduroy fabric version of chinos; similar silhouette and purpose but different material texture impacting usage slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Straight-Fit Trutemp365 Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight-fit chino pant designed with performance and comfort in mind, very similar silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Straight Fit Washed Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Washed straight fit chinos very close to the reference in fit, fabric, and styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Five-Pocket Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit five-pocket pants similar to chino styling; possibly less emphasis on traditional chino fabric but close in silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Chino Pants Casual Dress Chinos Pant In Blue Or
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual dress chinos very similar in silhouette and purpose to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Athletic Slim Performance Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic slim performance pants may resemble slim chinos in silhouette but emphasize performance fabric and stretch more.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Tech Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit tech chino very close to the reference product in styling and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Everyday 5 Pocket Stretch Chino Active Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Everyday five pocket stretch chino active pants align well with casual chino style though with stretch and performance focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Slim Straight Leg Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim straight leg chino pants from Rhone very similar to reference in style and fabric type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Pants Men 33x30 Tan Mason Chino Stretch Performance
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stretch performance chino pants similar in styling but emphasizing stretch fabric more than purely organic cotton chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Non-iron Tailored Slim Fit Chino Pants Men's Sz 35x32
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tailored slim fit chinos, non-iron, closely matching the reference in silhouette and chino category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men Club Monaco Connor Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Named chinos from Club Monaco matching in silhouette and purpose, similar to the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Chino Pants Men Size 31Ã—25 Brown ($50 Tags)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard chino pants matching the reference in category and construction, size detail does not affect relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Pants | Banana Republic Fulton Skinny Chino Men's Pants Waist 35 Length 32 | Color: Tan | Size: 35 | Mycrew2u's Closet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny chino style from Banana Republic, closely related to traditional chinos albeit skinnier cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Traveler Chino Slim Fit Tan Beige Pants Men's 30 X30
